critique: The document is an executive order from President George W. Bush declaring a national emergency with respect to North Korea due to the proliferation of weapons-usable fissile material. It blocks property and interests of North Korea and North Korean nationals, prohibits U.S. persons from registering vessels in North Korea, and authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to take actions to carry out the order. The order prioritizes national security and restricts economic activity with North Korea.
